        Indicates if the ad is skippable

        Returns the number of seconds of playback before the ad becomes skippable.
        Returns:
        skip offset seconds

      • getContentType

        String getContentType()
        content type of the creative media
        Returns:
        the content type of the creative media selected for offline playback, or null if no creative is selected or the content type is unavailable.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        height of the creative media
        Returns:
        the selected for offline playback, or -1 if no height available.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        width of the creative media
        Returns:
        the width of the creative media selected for offline playback, or -1 if no width available.
